nodes.text: The Sabrash system was a star system that was located in the Kastolar sector, a part of Kashyyyk Region in the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. The system was the origin point of the group known as the Sabrashi, and shared its name with the company Sabrashi Bio-Chemical Deterrents, Inc.
The Sabrash system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed the system in grid square R-9.
